pageProduct.name: Stratamark Stretch Mark Gel 20g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Stratamark is a rapidly drying, nonsticky,

transparent, silicone gel

formulation for the treatment and prevention of stretch marks

Warnings

  • For external use only.
  • Stratamark should not be applied to third degree burns or to open wounds.
  • Stratamark should not be placed in contact with mucous membranes or the eyes.
  • Stratamark should not be applied over other skin treatments without the advice of your physician.
  • Stratamark may stain clothing if not completely dry. If staining occurs, dry cleaning should be able to remove it without any damaging of the fabric.
  • If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult your physician.
  • Keep this product out of the reach of children.
  • Store below 30C (86F).
  • Do not use after the expiration (EXP) date printed on the tube.

Common Uses

Prevention and treatment of stretch marks

Ingredients

Polydimethylsiloxanes,

siloxanes, alkylmethyl silicones
